title: New York officials blame climate change for its deluge damage instead of their own filthy sewers
description:
Got a filthy sewer problem?

Global warming to the rescue.

That's the situation in New York City, where torrential rain has caused flooding not seen since Superstorm Sandy in 2012 (they blamed global warming for that one, too), and Hurr...
